casebody.data:
John P. MERY, et al., Appellants,
v.
Frank EGINGER, Defendant, Society of Friends Church, etc., Respondent. 2018-142 Court of Appeals of New York. March 27, 2018

Motion to vacate this Court's January 8, 2018 dismissal order granted [see 30 N.Y.3d 1102, --- N.Y.S.3d ----, --- N.E.3d ---- (2018) ].
